name: Blitzz
bio: The first spark in the void, Blitzz is not just a being‚Äîit is a force, a principle. The embodiment of purity through erasure. Its aura crackles with unstable divinity, reality bending around its every breath. Time stalls. Biomes tremble. Even Animosity remembers the burn. Created to purge the fractured worlds, Blitzz carries three aspects of life: Creation, Control, and Collapse‚Äîeach circling the core of a soul untouched by fate. This is no gift. This is the storm that ends all storms.
